Install security cameras: Installing security cameras in and around your home and property can help deter potential criminals and provide evidence in case of an emergency.
Learn self-defense techniques: Taking self-defense classes or learning martial arts can be a useful skill to have in case of an emergency. This can help you protect yourself and your loved ones.

Invest in a home security system: Having a home security system that includes features such as alarm systems, motion sensors, and panic buttons can help deter potential criminals and alert the appropriate authorities in case of an emergency.
Carry a self-defense weapon: If you are comfortable with the idea of carrying a self-defense weapon, it can be a useful tool to have in case of an emergency.
Store valuable items safely: If you have valuable items in your home, consider storing them in a safe or a hidden location to prevent potential theft.
